{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = DIR 505 Angle.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = SharePort Mobile Companion |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.dlink.com/us/en/home-solutions/connect/routers/dir-505-shareport-mobile-companion |sp = http://support.dlink.com/ProductInfo.aspx?m=DIR-505 |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = D-Link |model = DIR-505 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/07/2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/D-Link_DIR-505_rev_A1 |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = KA2IR505A1 |icid = 4216A-IR505A1 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR1311;AR1311-AL1A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 400 <!-- 400 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6406EM2I-12G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU32M16DG-AC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = AA:BE:19, C8:BE:19 |oui = AA:BE:19, C8:BE:19
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31;LSDK-9.2.0_U9.915;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = <!-- AC Hertz --> |pwr_amp_ac = 0.3 |pwr_conn = NEMA 1-15P |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pad header,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = Admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = dlink-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Cameo |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2017 |fccapprovdate = 03/07/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 790069372834 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0081TXIQA |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Made In China" and "Rev:A0-1" is silkscreened on the auxillary power board. :'''Cameo''' seems to be the manufacturer.
The default SSID pattern appears to be '''dlink-XXXX''' (where '''XXXX''' is a 4 digit hex number w/ lower case letters).
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31812-d-link-dir-505-shareport-mobile-companion-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Wikis=== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-505 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] ===Forum posts=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=175161 On the '''OpenWrt''' Forums] :Flash: MX25L6406EM2I :RAM: NT5TU32M16DG :CPU (as identified in Linux): AR9330, MIPS 24Kc V7.4, 266.24 BMIPS, 400MHz CPU clock :'''rAndy''' indicated the device boots via TFTP with the TEW-712BR image
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/d-link/d-link_dir-505 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-505 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=38742 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 14.07 |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
